issue.title: Model Editor: Add "move to" option to context menu

content.raw:
Not sure if I should make a separate issue for this, but you should also be able to delete a nested model from the model editor via context menu. I'd love to take this/these on myself, but for a week or two because I'm doing the PCH and windows plugins stuff now. Is someone else working on this?
@JJMarple
